extendedInfo.description: GPS Tracker by FollowMee tracks location of an Android device (phone or tablet). Installing the App to a device that you want to track, it quietly records its locations (GPS, WiFi, or cellular triangulation) periodically and uploads to a secured server. To monitor location of your tracked device, you simply open our web site (http://www.FollowMee.com) in any browser (either desktop or mobile). Using this app, you can track your children's movement daily, follow whereabouts of your family members or employees. In additions, you can locate your lost or stolen device. Having an old Android phone gathering dust somewhere in the house. Put it into good use! Convert it to a Vehicle Tracking Device. Use it to track your vehicle. You don't even need cellular service to run the app if your phone has WiFi and you don't need a real-time tracker. For details, visit Support page of our web site. The GPS Tracker is tested to be working in a Nexus 7 tablet.USE CASE:* Follow whereabouts of your husband/wife (spouse tracking), your kids (children tracking), or other family members (family tracking)* Locate your employees and monitor their daily activities* Install to your device so that you can record tracks, or allow other people locate you* Track your running, walking, hiking, or biking. Publish your tracks and share with your friends* LoJack your cars in a cheap way* Locate your lost or stolen Android device FEATURES:* Free Location Monitor There is no subscription fee to track your devices. Simply open our web site (http://www.FollowMee.com) in your desktop or mobile browser. 7-day history is maintained in the web site for paid app users. Extended history (45-day or 90-day) is available* Tracking Multiple Devices You can track multiple devices in your account. All your devices are shown in the same place * Real-Time Update Location data for your device is available in our web site real-time. Please note that this feature is not available for WiFi-only tablets * Vehicle Tracking Device (Deluxe Edition)Enable a full-time tracking device for your vehicle. Tracking starts when the car is driven, and pauses when the car is stopped* Stealth ModeHide the app and make it invisible. To open the app, you need to dial a special number or click a link* Geo-Fencing You will receive notification email when your tracked device exits or enters the geo-fence. Use this function to alert you when your child arrives to school or gets home . Geo-fencing can be set up in our web site * Opt-in Sharing You can publish your tracks through URLs or downloadable KML files. You can embed your tracks in your own web site or Facebook * Downloadable Reports with Mileage You can download your tracks in HTML or CSV (Excel) file format and include mileage calculation * Low Battery Consumption This app is designed to conserve your device battery and it does not drain your phone battery * Always On Once the app starts, GPS Tracker continues to run, even after the phone reboots. It runs quietly in the background and requires no human interaction * No-Internet Contingency Location data is uploaded to our secured server. When internet is temporarily unavailable, location data is cached (encrypted) in the iPhone. It resumes uploading when internet becomes available again * Multiple Mobile Platforms GPS Tracker for other mobile platforms (iOS and Blackberry) are available in our web site FREE VERSION LIMITATION:This is a trial version of GPS Tracker by FollowMee - Deluxe Edition. It will be good for 15 days. After 15 days, the app will be converted to free version with the following limitation. * Track interval less than 30 minutes is only available for paid version* Only current location viewing is available for free version. Past location viewing is only available for paid version* Upgrade to the Standard or Deluxe version to remove the above restrictions

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: We have been using Google Latitude to track our family and we have been concerned about finding a suitable replacement for the app.  We have been pleasantly surprised by Followmee.  It works flawlessly,  has a  simple interface.and is extremely reliable.
reviews.author: Ken Arledge

reviews.title: awesome app. Must Have
reviews.comment: awesome app. Lets me see were my device is at all times I even tried walking around just my apt and the location was right on love it got to get it for yourself
reviews.author: Teesa Shockley

reviews.title: Seems to work really well as Latitude replacement
reviews.comment: Only been using it a day but it is simple & accurate.  And if you put a shortcut to the webpage on your home screen, it works very much the same - hit the icon and you get a Google map with the phone location on it.  Better in one way; you don\'t have to fuss around with enabling it as you did with Latitude.
reviews.author: Ann Monroe

reviews.title: Almost a home run
reviews.comment: Follow mee does almost exactly what it say  Good areas: Stealth mode works perfectly. Well hidden, hard to discover, and works like a system app. Accuracy is within 50-100 feet, and you can follow from phone, tablet, laptop, pc, or anything else.   Room for improvement: the only area that I was disappointed with was that the information was not always current, even after clicking update/ refresh. I was never sure if the program was malfunctioning or if it was the device.   All-in-all a good app. I give it..
reviews.author: Andy Just andy

reviews.title: Really good apps, on my 2 Androids and 1 Iphone.
reviews.comment: Have it for 48 hrs or so now. Works well. The MAP works well enough I find myself glued to the map for hours. Power drain is not a prob at all, even at 5 min update intervals. Most of our problems are to do with the phones not getting good GPS signals. Once I started the GPS Test app on my phone I\'ve learned to put it close to an ext window and WOW most probs disappear. Only if apps still works in backgrd mode when phone in sleep mode. Still don\'t know how to upgrade to Delux from Standard. I like the coded lines on the phone when its running, very informative. Panic button works well on Delux. Battery % readout is very cool too.
reviews.author: Thach Ly

reviews.title: Great App for Emergency\'s
reviews.comment: i put it on my daughters phone ,the other day  she called me and said she had a flat tire and wanted me to come change it for her. but she wasn\'t sure what the name of the road she was on was. i used my phone to find her and i changed her tire.
reviews.author: Bill Barrow

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: I had .a different tracking device prior to d/lg FollowMee. This App has twice the performance of that application and half of the problems.
reviews.author: Patricia Voelkel

reviews.title: Good replacement for latitude...
reviews.comment: Only draw back is you have to go to the web site to view the locations.
reviews.author: Kristina Henson

reviews.title: Very happy with app
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Very happy
reviews.author: Marina Sofocleous

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: Horrible application. They charged us multiple times when we had to reinstall. Don\'t waste your money.
reviews.author: Justice Moor

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Does what it says. Nice to have android and iOS on same map. Location pretty accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what says
reviews.comment: Great app. Leaves a cookie trail of where the phone has been. No other GPS app does it this well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: tracking 6 delivery employees
reviews.comment: decent for the price  maps gui is not impressive but does the job.  five stars would be given if you could view \"bread crumbs\" when tracking all vehicles on a single map page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you have a child that you care to aware of THIER whereabouts at any giving time this app is for you \nDoes exactly what it says it does
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not true
reviews.comment: to use \"stealth mode\" you need to allow non market app downloads to your phone and download an additional app from their website. seems shady, why is the addition not available through the Android market if it\'s legit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it.....caught a cheater spouse
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works great
reviews.comment: This program works in the background. Very easy and simple to use. It gives me peace of mind. Highly recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Excellent software. Works great!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Results from using Followmee Apps
reviews.comment: Humungous ThankYou to All the Staff at FollowMee,,,,, Excellent Results after tracking My Daughters New Laptop and Tablet phone\'\'\' She had Them both Stolen,and Now We have recovered Them,and the Police haved Charged the Thief.... Crime does NOT pay when You are associated with FollowMee associates   ThankYou again fro a Very Happy Daughter,,
reviews.author: gerry capaldi

reviews.title: Catherine Swann
reviews.comment: Excellent have been trying different types of tracker and this is the one for me!
reviews.author: david swann
